statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} - 24 \, x - 5 , -3 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 6 \, x - 5 , 4 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 5 \, x + 4 , -x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 1 , 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
